import React from "react" import ReactDom from 'react-dom' import { Form } from './CreateForm' import FocusTrap from 'focus-trap-react' import '../../css/Modal.css' export const Modal =({ onClickOutside, onKeyDown, modalRef, buttonRef, closeModal, onSubmit }) => { return ReactDom.createPortal(
, document.body ) } export default Modal
